issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Yarn service pre-maturely releases the container after AM restart

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Delete registry entries from ZK on ServiceClient stop and clean up stop/destroy behavior

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: ServiceMaster should only wait for recovery of containers with id that match the current application id

comments.body:
Patch 1 derives applicationId from containerId which is retrieved from registry and then compares the application id with current application id. 

Also added a unit test which verifies the added code.

Thanks [~csingh] . I tested patch 003 and all UTs and manual tests passed. +1 for 003 patch.
I am also +1 for patch 003. I plan to commit this to trunk and branch-3.1. Thanks for the patch [~csingh] and for the review [~gsaha]!

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #13749 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/13749/])
YARN-7958. ServiceMaster should only wait for recovery of containers (billie: rev 5ed689e33ac0becfc36d5fa424466bb1732aa59b)
